content: So they were -- overall, the Navy business was slightly down for us in the quarter And then if you look at the EBIT margins, you can see at 17.1%, down from 20.7% a year ago. So, as you mentioned, John, I mean it's -- and as Vic said, it's maybe not going to be perfectly linear, but we're hopeful to get to kind of a more stable, steady growth output as opposed to kind of a lot of the up and down we've seen over -- really through the whole pandemic.
